Atom Bomb.NAME: Atom Bomb
Atom Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL fighters. NL Exhaust.

Poison Darts.NAME: Poison Darts
Poison Darts.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Necrotic Poison X times. NL Apply X Poison to ALL enemies.
Poison Darts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X Necrotic Poison. Apply !M! Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies X times.

Draining Mist.NAME: Draining Mist
Draining Mist.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Necrotic Poison to a random enemy !M! times. NL Apply -1 Strength to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Draining Mist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Necrotic Poison to a random enemy !M! times. NL Apply -2 Strength to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Toxin Wave.NAME: Toxin Wave
Toxin Wave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Necrotic Poison to ALL enemies.

Hidden Blade.NAME: Hidden Blade
Hidden Blade.DESCRIPTION: Add a Shiv to your hand and draw !M! cards.

Fluid Movement.NAME: Fluid Movement
Fluid Movement.DESCRIPTION: Keep up to !M! Block between rounds.

Combo Extender.NAME: Combo Extender
Combo Extender.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is drawn after the start of your turn, it costs 0 until it is next played.

Sneak Up.NAME: Sneak Up
Sneak Up.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Discard all Attacks in your hand. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Innate. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
Sneak Up.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Innate. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrosis.NAME: Necrosis
ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrosis.DESCRIPTION: Convert all Poison on all enemies to Necrotic Poison. NL Exhaust.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses all Poison. Apply Necrotic Poison equal to the amount lost to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Extra Pockets.NAME: Extra Pockets
ReplayTheSpireMod:Extra Pockets.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Add Shivs to your hand equal to its cost.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Extra Pockets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Add Upgraded Shivs to your hand equal to its cost.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Scrap Shanks.NAME: Scrap Shanks
ReplayTheSpireMod:Scrap Shanks.DESCRIPTION: Each time you discard a card during your turn, add !M! Shiv to your hand.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Scrap Shanks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each time you discard a card during your turn, add !M! Upgraded Shiv to your hand.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Shiv Toss.NAME: Shiv Toss
ReplayTheSpireMod:Shiv Toss.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Shivs in your hand. NL Your Shivs deal !M! extra damage this combat for each one discarded. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Shiv Toss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all Shivs in your hand. NL Your Shivs deal !M! extra damage this combat for each one discarded. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Retain.

ReplayTheSpireMod:The Works.NAME: The Works
ReplayTheSpireMod:The Works.DESCRIPTION: For every 3 cards you draw this turn, gain [E] and deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Becomes Unplayable until end of round.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Spot Opening.NAME: Spot Opening
ReplayTheSpireMod:Spot Opening.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy with Weakness, gain !B! Block and !M! Reflection.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Exploit Weakness.NAME: Exploit Weakness
ReplayTheSpireMod:Exploit Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Apply Languid equal to target's Weak. NL Exhaust.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Exploit Weakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Languid to ALL emenies equal to target's Weak.

ReplayTheSpireMod:From All Sides.NAME: From All Sides
ReplayTheSpireMod:From All Sides.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2X + !M! times.
ReplayTheSpireMod:From All Sides.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards from your hand. NL Apply 1 Weak and deal !D! X damage to a random enemy for each.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
ReplayTheSpireMod:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Stun a random enemy. NL Exhaust.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Tripwire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Stun a random enemy and draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

Replay:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
Replay:Decoy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Random discard and Exhaust effects prioritize this. NL When Exhausted or discarded during your turn, gain !B! Block this turn and next.
Replay:Decoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Random discard and Exhaust effects prioritize this. NL When played, Exhausted, or discarded during your turn, gain !B! Block this turn and next.

Replay:Bag of Tricks.NAME: Bag of Tricks
Replay:Bag of Tricks.DESCRIPTION: Choose X: NL Apply !replay:M+1! Poison, NL add !replay:M-1! shivs to your hand, NL gain !B! block, draw !replay:M-2! cards, NL or gain [E] [E] next turn.
Replay:Bag of Tricks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose X: NL Apply !replay:M+2! Poison, NL add !replay:M-1! shivs to your hand, NL gain !B! block, draw !replay:M-2! cards, NL or gain [E] [E] [E] next turn.

Replay:Poison Smokescreen.NAME: Poison Smokescreen
Replay:Poison Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply that much Poison randomly split among all enemies.
Replay:Poison Smokescreen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply that much Poison to all enemies.

Abandon.NAME: Abandon
Abandon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card for each. NL Add a Void to your discard pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Ethereal.
Abandon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card for each. NL Add a Dazed to your discard pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Ethereal.

Defy Death.NAME: Defy Death
Defy Death.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs [R] less for each card you've Exhausted this combat. NL Grave.

Life Link.NAME: Life Bind
Life Link.DESCRIPTION: Apply to an enemy. When you lose health, the bound enemy takes that much damage.

Massacre.NAME: Massacre
Massacre.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose all Strength. NL Affected !M! times by Strength.

Hemogenesis.NAME: Hemogenesis
Hemogenesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Heal !M! HP. Exhaust. NL Upgrade each time you lose HP while this is in your hand.

Run Through.NAME: Run Through
Run Through.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !D! HP and !M! Block.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Hemoarmum.NAME: Hemoarmum
ReplayTheSpireMod:Hemoarmum.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP and gain !B! Shielding X times. NL Refund 3. NL Exhaust.

Demonic Infusion.NAME: Demonic Infusion
Demonic Infusion.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a Skill or Attack in your hand X times. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Exhaust.
Demonic Infusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a Skill or Attack in your hand X+ !M! times. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Exhaust.

Single Out.NAME: Single Out
Single Out.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. If it is not an Attack or Power, Exhaust it.

Cursed Blade.NAME: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You cannot play other cards while this is in your hand.

ReplayReversal.NAME: Reversal
ReplayReversal.DESCRIPTION: Keep Block at the end of this round. NL Gain !M! Reflection.
ReplayReversal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Keep Block at the end of the next !replay:M-1! rounds. NL Gain !M! Reflection.

ReplayTheSpireMod:LeadingStrike.NAME: Leading Strike
ReplayTheSpireMod:LeadingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of an Attack in your hand to !M! this turn.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Corrosion Curse.NAME: Corrosion Curse
ReplayTheSpireMod:Corrosion Curse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !replay:M-1! Languid and !M! Decrepit. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Replay:Many Hands.NAME: Many Hands
Replay:Many Hands.DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of Undeath's Touch to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Replay:Many Hands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of Undeath's Touch to your hand. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Replay:Undeath's Touch.NAME: Undeath's Touch
Replay:Undeath's Touch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 1 Decrepit. NL Exhaust.

Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, and replace it with random cards that cost 1 less than normal. NL Exhaust.
Eclipse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, and replace it with random cards that cost 1 less than normal. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Exhaust.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Strike From Hell.NAME: Strike From Hell
ReplayTheSpireMod:Strike From Hell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, increase its damage by !M! and place it back into your hand.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Limb From Limb.NAME: Limb From Limb
ReplayTheSpireMod:Limb From Limb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals at least !M! unblocked damage, Refund 2 and draw 2 cards.

ReplayScrap.NAME: Scrap
ReplayScrap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a (non-minion) enemy, heal 6 HP and permanently increase this card's Damage by !M!.

ReplayGash.NAME: Claw Rake
ReplayGash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Grave. Counts as Claw. NL Startup: if your deck has no normal Claw cards, add one to your draw pile.

Crystallizer.NAME: Crystallizer
Crystallizer.DESCRIPTION: Crystal orbs give !M! additional Focus to adjacent orbs. NL At the end of your turn, if more than half your orb slots are empty, Channel 1 Crystal.
Crystallizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Crystal orbs give !M! additional Focus to adjacent orbs. NL At the end of your turn, if more than half your orb slots are empty, Channel 1 Crystal.

ReplayTheSpireMod:GoodbyeWorld.NAME: Empty Bin
ReplayTheSpireMod:GoodbyeWorld.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust all Common cards in your hand, and gain !M! Block for each.
ReplayTheSpireMod:GoodbyeWorld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust all Common cards in your hand, and gain !M! Block for each.

Mirror Shield.NAME: Mirror Shield
Mirror Shield.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Crystal. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Reflection.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Repulse.NAME: Repulse
ReplayTheSpireMod:Repulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Reflection. NL Shuffle 1 Backfire into your discard pile.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Omega Cannon.NAME: Omega Cannon
ReplayTheSpireMod:Omega Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Add a Backfire to your draw & discard piles.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Dual Polarity.NAME: Dual Polarity
ReplayTheSpireMod:Dual Polarity.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lightning and Dark, NL Crystal and Frost, NL Water and Hellfire, NL or Glass and Plasma.

Reflective Lens.NAME: Reflective Lens
Reflective Lens.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Glass. NL Glass orbs give Reflection as a passive ability.

Panic Button.NAME: Panic Button
Panic Button.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your orbs. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.
Panic Button.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your orbs. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

BasicCrystalCard.NAME: Crystal Conduit
BasicCrystalCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Crystal. NL Channel 1 random orb.

ReplaySort.NAME: Sort
ReplaySort.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Rare OR non-Status cards in your discard pile back into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards.
ReplaySort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Rare OR non-Status cards in your discard pile back into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards. NL Retain.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Rare cards from your discard pile into your deck. NL Draw !M! cards.
Shuffle all non-Status cards from your discard pile into your deck. NL Draw !M! cards.
Shuffle all 0-cost cards from your discard pile into your deck. NL Draw !M! cards.

ReplaySolidLightProjector.NAME: Solid Light Projector
ReplaySolidLightProjector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Shielding for every !M! cards in your discard pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayOverclock.NAME: Overclock
ReplayOverclock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Focus.

Time Bomb.NAME: Time Bomb
Time Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Orb Slots. NL Channel 2 Glass. NL Channel 1 Dark and trigger its passive !M! times. NL Exhaust.

FIFO Queue.NAME: FIFO Queue
FIFO Queue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2X Orb Slots. NL Channel 1 Glass. NL Refund !stslib:refund!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:System Scan.NAME: System Scan
ReplayTheSpireMod:System Scan.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Status cards you draw Exhaust and draw 1 card when drawn.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Reroute Power.NAME: Reroute Power
ReplayTheSpireMod:Reroute Power.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Strength and Focus. NL Draw !M! card.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Reroute Power.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap your Strength and Focus. NL Draw !M! card. NL Retain.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Fabricate Wheel.NAME: Fabricate Wheel
ReplayTheSpireMod:Fabricate Wheel.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Prayer Wheel relic. NL Fleeting.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Fabricate Wheel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Prayer Wheel relic. NL You may choose 1 of 3 random Rare cards to permanently add to your deck. NL Fleeting.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Muscle Training.NAME: Weight Training
ReplayTheSpireMod:Muscle Training.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Speed Training.NAME: Speed Training
ReplayTheSpireMod:Speed Training.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Discard a random card. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Calculation Training.NAME: Calculation Training
ReplayTheSpireMod:Calculation Training.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus. NL Add !M! Dazed to your discard pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Calculation Training.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Startup: add !M! Dazed to your discard pile.

Replay:Refactor.NAME: Refactor
Replay:Refactor.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Lose !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Focus. NL Choose: Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Focus. NL Exhaust.
Replay:Refactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Lose !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Focus. NL Choose: Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Focus. NL Exhaust.

Improvise.NAME: Improvise
Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.
Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to upgrade and add to your hand. NL It costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.

Midas Touch.NAME: Midas Touch
Midas Touch.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. NL Add a random Rare card to your hand for each. NL Exhaust.
Midas Touch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. NL Add a random Upgraded Rare card to your hand for each. NL Exhaust.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Private Reserves.NAME: Private Reserves
ReplayTheSpireMod:Private Reserves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

Poisoned Strike.NAME: Poisoned Strike
Poisoned Strike.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! Poison. NL Affected by damage modifiers.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Trickstab.NAME: Trickstab
ReplayTheSpireMod:Trickstab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Affected by block modifiers.

Specialist.NAME: Specialist
Specialist.DESCRIPTION: All non-attack damage you deal is increased by !M!.
Specialist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL All non-attack damage you deal is increased by !M!.

ReplayUltimateDefense.NAME: The Ultimate Defense
ReplayUltimateDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain 5 Plated Armor. NL Gain !B! Shielding.
ReplayUltimateDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain 5 Plated Armor. NL Gain !B! Shielding.

Replay:Sssssssssstrike.NAME: Sssstrike
Replay:Sssssssssstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !D! for each [E] this cost. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Snecko.

Replay:Sssssssssshield.NAME: Sssshield
Replay:Sssssssssshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Shielding for each [E] this cost. NL Snecko. NL Exhaust.
Replay:Sssssssssshield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Shielding for each [E] this cost. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Snecko. NL Exhaust.

Replay:Dark Deal.NAME: Dark Deal
Replay:Dark Deal.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: Choose 1 of !M! random Black cards to add to your draw pile.
Replay:Dark Deal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Grave. NL Startup: Choose 1 of !M! random Black cards to add to your draw pile.

Replay:Resounding Blow.NAME: Resounding Blow
Replay:Resounding Blow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When drawn, add an Echo of this card to your hand.

Replay:Duplecho.NAME: Duplecho
Replay:Duplecho.DESCRIPTION: Create X Echoes of a card in your hand.
Replay:Duplecho.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create X Echoes of a card in your hand. NL Refund !stslib!.

Replay:SS_Removal.NAME: Shop Special: Card Removal Service
Replay:SS_Removal.DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove a card from your deck. NL Fleeting.
Replay:SS_Removal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove a card from your deck. NL Fleeting. NL You may choose to spend !M! gold to negate Fleeting.

Replay:SS_Rewards.NAME: Shop Special: Rewards Program
Replay:SS_Rewards.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold for each card in your draw pile. NL Purge.
Replay:SS_Rewards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! gold for each card in your draw pile. NL Purge.

Replay:SS_Contract.NAME: Shop Special: Contract
Replay:SS_Contract.DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked damage this turn, gain that much Max HP. NL Fleeting.
Replay:SS_Contract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked damage this turn, gain that much Max HP. NL Permanently Downgrade this card. NL Exhaust.

Replay:SS_Spare Waffle.NAME: Shop Special: Spare Waffle
Replay:SS_Spare Waffle.DESCRIPTION: Heal to full HP. NL Retain. NL Fleeting.
Replay:SS_Spare Waffle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal to full HP. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL Retain. NL Fleeting.

Crow Ritual.NAME: Awakened One Ritual
Crow Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! πRitual Components to your draw and discard piles. If 5 are ever in your hand at once, they become !D! damage Attacks.

Ritual Component.NAME: Ritual Component
Ritual Component.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If it is an Attack, take !M! damage.

Looming Evil.NAME: Looming Evil
Looming Evil.DESCRIPTION: Can be played for !M! Energy to Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a curse into your draw pile and reduce cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Energy to Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a curse into your draw pile and reduce cost.

Hallucinations.NAME: Hallucinations
Hallucinations.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add !M! random card to your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Sickly.NAME: Sickly
Sickly.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Block.

Languid.NAME: Depression
Languid.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain !M! Languid and draw a card.

CommonCold.NAME: Common Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Is Exhausted by Medical Kit rather than Blue Candle.

Delirium.NAME: Delirium
Delirium.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain Confusion for 1 round.

Voices.NAME: Voices
Voices.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Startup: Add !M! copies of this card to your discard pile.

Spreading Infection.NAME: Spreading Infection
Spreading Infection.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, duplicate all other Status and Curse cards in your hand.

Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand.

AbeCurse.NAME: Abe's Revenge
AbeCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Frail. NL Ethereal.

MirrorMistCurse.NAME: The Mists
MirrorMistCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL You somehow had no transformable cards, so you got this instead.

Overencumbered.NAME: Over-Encumbered
Overencumbered.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this, add !M! Dazed to your hand and draw a card.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Doomed.NAME: Doomed
ReplayTheSpireMod:Doomed.DESCRIPTION: Die. NL Fleeting. NL Ethereal. NL Grave.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Restless Dread.NAME: Restless Dread
ReplayTheSpireMod:Restless Dread.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Draw 1 card. NL Add !M! random Curses to your discard pile. NL Exhaust. NL Grave.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Splinters.NAME: Splinters
ReplayTheSpireMod:Splinters.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Startup: add a copy of this to your draw pile.

ReplayTheSpireMod:IOU.NAME: I.O.U.
ReplayTheSpireMod:IOU.DESCRIPTION: Costs !M! gold to play. NL Fleeting. NL Soulbound.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Whispers of Evil.NAME: Whispers of Evil
ReplayTheSpireMod:Whispers of Evil.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card. NL At the end of your turn, add !M! Echo of a random Curse to your draw pile.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Misquitos.NAME: A Very Large Swarm Of Misquitos
ReplayTheSpireMod:Misquitos.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL fighters.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Imminent Threat.NAME: Imminent Threat
ReplayTheSpireMod:Imminent Threat.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Take !M! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Switches to Vengeful Threat.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Vengeful Threat.NAME: Vengeful Threat
ReplayTheSpireMod:Vengeful Threat.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL Switches to Imminent Threat.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Meltdown Sequence.NAME: Meltdown Sequence
ReplayTheSpireMod:Meltdown Sequence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cycle. When cycled: NL Add 1 Lagged to your discard pile. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Startup: Add !M! Lagged+ to your draw pile.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Meltdown Sequence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL [#ff9900]OVERHEAT: [#ff9900]< !construct:O! [#ff9900]> NL Cycle. When cycled: NL Add 1 Lagged to your discard pile. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Startup: Add !M! Lagged+ to your draw pile.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Compounding Headache.NAME: Compounding Headache
ReplayTheSpireMod:Compounding Headache.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Lose !beaked:wI! HP. NL Exhaust. NL Wither -1.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Traitor's Concience.NAME: Traitor's Concience
ReplayTheSpireMod:Traitor's Concience.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take !beaked:wI! damage. NL Wither -1.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Wavering Confidence.NAME: Wavering Confidence
ReplayTheSpireMod:Wavering Confidence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Self-Retaining. NL At the end of your turn, Switches to Delayed Remorse.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Greater Regret.NAME: Delayed Remorse
ReplayTheSpireMod:Greater Regret.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take !M! Fibonacci damage. NL Switches to Wavering Confidence.

Replay:Sluggish.NAME: Sluggish
Replay:Sluggish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaustive !stslib:ex!. NL Amplify [E] : Draw 1 card and reduce Exhaustive counter an extra time.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Echoes of Time.NAME: Echoes of Time
ReplayTheSpireMod:Echoes of Time.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards you've Exhausted this combat. NL Grave. NL Purge.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand.
NL Add !M! Upgraded Shivs to your hand.
NL Gain !M! Fuel and shuffle !M! Trinkets into your draw pile.
NL Shuffle !M! random Cores into your draw pile.
NL Shuffle !M! random Cantrips into your draw pile.
NL Heal !M! HP and Replenish !replay:M-1! uses of all Wither and/or Exhaustive cards in your hand and discard pile.
NL Replicate up to !M! of your relics and Retain !M! cards this turn.
NL Heal !M! HP and shuffle !M! Inspiration into your draw pile.
NL Add !M! Sparks to your hand. NL Amplify [E] : add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
NL Add !M! Cogs to your draw pile.
NL Split into a random Slime. NL Apply !M! Slimed to all enemies.
NL Shuffle !M! random Letters into your draw pile.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrogeddon.NAME: Necrogeddon
ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrogeddon.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards you've Exhausted this combat. NL Grave.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Necrogeddon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards you've Exhausted this combat to ALL enemies. NL Grave.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Haul.NAME: Haul
ReplayTheSpireMod:Haul.DESCRIPTION: Draw your entire draw pile. NL You cannot draw any more cards this turn. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Haul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw your entire draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Black Plague.NAME: Black Plague
ReplayTheSpireMod:Black Plague.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Apply !M! Necrotic Poison. NL Apply !M! Languid. NL Apply !M! Decrepit. NL Exhaust.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Black Plague.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Apply !M! Languid. NL Apply !M! Decrepit. NL When the target dies, play this on all other enemies. NL Exhaust.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Chaos Vortex.NAME: Chaos Vortex
ReplayTheSpireMod:Chaos Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Shielding. NL Confuse all enemies. NL !M! card you draw each turn has its stats and effects scrambled.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Chaos Vortex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Shielding. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Confuse all enemies. NL !M! card you draw each turn has its stats and effects scrambled.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Echo Chamber.NAME: Echo Chamber
ReplayTheSpireMod:Echo Chamber.DESCRIPTION: Make an Echo of the first !M! non-Ethereal non-Power cards you play each turn.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Echo Chamber.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make an Echo of the first !M! cards you play each turn.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Brewmster.NAME: Brewmaster
ReplayTheSpireMod:Brewmster.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion at the start of each round.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Brewmster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion at the start of each round.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Dark Transmutation.NAME: Dark Transmutation
ReplayTheSpireMod:Dark Transmutation.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Black cards to your hand. NL They cost 1 less this round. NL Purge.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Dark Transmutation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X random Black cards to your hand. NL They cost 1 less this round. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Purge.

Replay:Fractal Strike.NAME: Fractal Strike
Replay:Fractal Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Add a new Fractal πStrike to your discard pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Rythmic Step.NAME: Rythmic Step
ReplayTheSpireMod:Rythmic Step.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Switches into Rythmic Lunge.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Rythmic Lunge.NAME: Rythmic Step
ReplayTheSpireMod:Rythmic Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Rythmic Step.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Uncanny Aura.NAME: Uncanny Aura
ReplayTheSpireMod:Uncanny Aura.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Grave. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity for each other Unplayable card in your hand.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Five Aces.NAME: Five Aces
ReplayTheSpireMod:Five Aces.DESCRIPTION: Each time you play a card, !M!% chance to gain 1 Critical.

Ghost Swipe.NAME: Ghost Swipe
Ghost Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

Ghost Defend.NAME: Ghost Defend
Ghost Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

Ghost Fetch.NAME: Ghost Fetch
Ghost Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a basic card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
Ghost Fetch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a basic card from your draw pile and place it into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Basic cards NL in my draw pile.

Pot Of Greed.NAME: Grinning Jar
Pot Of Greed.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You may not play another Grinning Jar this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I've already played a Grinning Jar this turn!
I've already played this card once this turn!

GremboGang.NAME: Grembo's Gang
GremboGang.DESCRIPTION: Summon a random gremlin to fight for you.
GremboGang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Summon a random gremlin to fight for you.

Scorching Beam.NAME: Scorching Beam
Scorching Beam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! Hellfire.

Firewall.NAME: Firewall
Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Each time you block incoming damage this round, Channel !M! Hellfire.

WeaponsOverheat.NAME: Overheat Weapons
WeaponsOverheat.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus if you have <0, Lose 1 Focus if you have >0. NL Channel 1 Hellfire. NL Add 1 Backfire to your discard pile. NL Ethereal.
WeaponsOverheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus if you have <0, Lose 1 Focus if you have >0. NL Channel 1 Hellfire. NL Ethereal.

Replay:Light Bash.NAME: Light Bash
Replay:Light Bash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Amplify [E] : also apply !M! Vulnerable.

Replay:Spark Circuitry.NAME: Spark Circuitry
Replay:Spark Circuitry.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Manaspark. NL Amplify [E] : Channel !M! Crystal first. NL Exhaust.

ReplayTheSpireMod:RavenHex.NAME: Raven's Hex
ReplayTheSpireMod:RavenHex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !beaked:wI! Languid and Decrepit. NL Wither 1.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Wings of Steel.NAME: Wings of Steel
ReplayTheSpireMod:Wings of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !beaked:wB! Shielding and NL !beaked:wI! Plated Armor. NL Wither !M!.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Wings of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !beaked:wB! Shielding, NL !beaked:wB! Block, NL and !beaked:wI! Plated Armor. NL Wither !M!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Owlgaze.NAME: Owlgaze
ReplayTheSpireMod:Owlgaze.DESCRIPTION: Stun a random enemy. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Wither !M!.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Owlgaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun all enemies. NL Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Wither !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Decreases Refund amount. NL Card is not Depleted until Refund drops below 0.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Prepare the Ceremony.NAME: Prepare the Ceremony
ReplayTheSpireMod:Prepare the Ceremony.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! πRitual Components to your hand. NL Each time you play a Skill this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Armaments MK-II.NAME: Armaments MK-II
ReplayTheSpireMod:Armaments MK-II.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a card in your hand. NL Can Mega-Upgrade cards.
ReplayTheSpireMod:Armaments MK-II.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand. NL Can Mega-Upgrade cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Mega-Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.

ReplayTheSpireMod:Mirror System.NAME: Mirror System
ReplayTheSpireMod:Mirror System.DESCRIPTION: [#ff9900]OVERHEAT: [#ff9900]< !construct:O! [#ff9900]> NL Cycle if you have < 1 Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Reflection.

BackFire.NAME: Backfire
BackFire.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 1 Vulnerable. NL At the end of your turn, take 6 damage. NL Exhaust.
BackFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 1 Vulnerable. NL At the end of your turn, take 8 damage. NL Exhaust.

MimicStatus.NAME: Mad Mimicry
MimicStatus.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

ReplayMimic_AttackMimicry.NAME: Attack Mimicry
ReplayMimic_AttackMimicry.DESCRIPTION: If target enemy intends to attack, add a copy of that attack to your hand. NL Exhaust.

ReplayMimic_RelicMimicry.NAME: Relic Mimicry
ReplayMimic_RelicMimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random non-common relic effect.

ReplayMimic_MadMimicry.NAME: Mimic Madness
ReplayMimic_MadMimicry.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a card in your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
ReplayMimic_MadMimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

ReplayMimic_PowerMimicry.NAME: Power Mimicry
ReplayMimic_PowerMimicry.DESCRIPTION: Copy 1 stack of a random enemy buff X times. NL Refund !M!.
ReplayMimic_PowerMimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy 1 stack of a random enemy buff X times. NL Refund !M!.

Replay:SS_forest_3.NAME: Patience
Replay:SS_forest_3.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Retain your hand this turn.
Replay:SS_forest_3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Your Block is not lost at the end of this round. NL Gain [E] at the start of next turn.

Replay:SS_forest_4.NAME: The Mists
Replay:SS_forest_4.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Keep your Block at the end of this turn. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Replay:SS_forest_5.NAME: Lost Forever
Replay:SS_forest_5.DESCRIPTION: Apply to an enemy. NL For every !M! health they lose, they gain 1 Languid.

Replay:SS_forest_6.NAME: Forest Fishers
Replay:SS_forest_6.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !M! Dexterity, or heal 10 HP.

Replay:SS_fish_2.NAME: Living Lantern
Replay:SS_fish_2.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL If you are below 50% max HP, gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Replay:SS_fish_3.NAME: Six Feet Under
Replay:SS_fish_3.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain 2 Weak. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Replay:SS_fish_4.NAME: Captain's Orders
Replay:SS_fish_4.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have <1 Strength, gain !M! Strength.

m_BoundBlade.NAME: Bound Blade
m_BoundBlade.DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Draw a card.
m_BoundBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cantrip. NL Add an Upgraded Shiv to your hand. NL Draw a card.
